patthana13.2:5.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana13.2:5.2: sukhāya vedanāya sampayutte khandhe paṭicca sukhavedanā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ;
patthana13.2:5.6: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana13.2:5.7: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe …
patthana13.2:5.9: sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:5.10: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:5.11: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:5.12: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:5.13: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #7
patthana13.2:6.1: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:6.2: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:6.3: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:6.4: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:6.5: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:6.6: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:6.7: Dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #7
patthana13.2:7.1: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:7.2: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:7.3: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:7.4: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:7.5: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:7.6: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:7.7: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:8.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa … pe … purejāte āsevane cuddasa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
patthana13.2:11.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
patthana13.2:12.1: Nahetuyā ekavīsa, naārammaṇe ekavīsa … pe … nakamme nava … pe … navippayutte cuddasa … pe … novigate ekavīsa.
patthana13.2:17.1: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.2:17.2: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.2:17.3: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.2:17.4: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.2:17.5: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.2:17.6: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.2:17.7: Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.2:18.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, ārammaṇe ekavīsa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
